duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer an average of 45-55 inbound calls per day, ranging from simple requests to complex inquiries from Clients and Financial Professionals.
Deliver exceptional customer service while adhering to departmental guidelines.
Manage multiple administrative systems and perform basic calculations using on-line tools.
Actively participate in and successfully complete customer service training and other training.
Work within the hours of operation as determined periodically.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma required, College degree preferred
